.. _contributing:

Contributing to semver
======================

.. meta::
   :description lang=en:
      Contributing to Python semver

The semver source code is managed using Git and is hosted on GitHub::

   git clone git://github.com/python-semver/python-semver

   :start-after: -text-begin-
